meanings.definition: The means or resources with which to accomplish something.
meanings.sent1: She used her wherewithals to start a small business.
meanings.sent2: He lacked the necessary wherewithals to fix his car.
meanings.sent3: With her wherewithals, she could finally pursue her dream of traveling.
meanings.sent4: His determination was the wherewithals that fueled his success.
meanings.sent5: The wherewithals at his disposal were enough to overcome any obstacle.

meanings.definition: The money or assets available to someone.
meanings.sent1: They invested their wherewithals wisely in the stock market.
meanings.sent2: She inherited a large sum of wherewithals from her grandparents.
meanings.sent3: His piggy bank held all his precious wherewithals.
meanings.sent4: The wherewithals in his wallet seemed to disappear quickly.
meanings.sent5: The wherewithals he saved up allowed him to buy his dream car.
